name: Cog In The System
description:
Are we just another cog in the system??

A fun, retro-themed, life-sim-kind-of-game where you strive to live your life according to a schedule you made for yourself. Work from home on time, study for several hours, do something (not so) different, eat, clean yourself, sleep, then repeat!

The game ends when you decide to be ~free~!
